entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Nain
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in the Natuashish area.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
